root.name: Hunters: Episode One
root.description: OverviewIn Hunters: Episode One, players take control of a squad of futuristic bounty hunters. You are rewarded with credits and experience for completing missions, which can be used to buy new equipment and unlock new abilities. Hunters is heavily inspired by old-school turn-based strategy games such as X-COM. Hunters: Episode One was originally released for iOS in 2011, with an Android version following in late 2012. A sequel, Hunters 2, was released as a universal iOS app in 2012.
